abstract: Some tips for filling out the federal financial aid form for children of same-sex parents or for applicants with same-sex partners.
snippet: Some tips for filling out the federal financial aid form for children of same-sex parents or for applicants with same-sex partners.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships

lead_paragraph: Filling out the federal form for student financial aid is an arduous task for most applicants. But if you have two mothers or two fathers, or if you happen to be married to a same-sex partner, it can quickly escalate into an even more complicated exercise.

headline.main: How to File for Financial Aid if Your Parents Are Gay
